pros: All of the staff are nice and helpful. You won't find any arrogance in this place. It's an excellent place to learn further about research process.
cons: You may be working overtime for a certain period.

pros:
- Working hours
- Work-life balances
- Trainings
- Work form Home

- there is a lot of independence in designing your role 
- competitive pay 
- smart colleagues
- the right position for someone who like research, particularly communicating research
cons: - sometimes, there are days with long hours of work

review_title: One of the Best Research Institutes in Indonesia
pros: Collaborative and encourage you to grow. J-PAL SEA is also very supportive if you want to continue your education. The relationship between employees is very friendly and doesn't feel hierarchical at all
cons: Their open office space is a double-swords. It encourages communications but it could be distracting at times.

pros: Work and life balance, positive environment, encourages you to grow better, nice pay
cons: Heavy workload but it’s still manageable

pros: Best place for learning, meeting research stakeholders in Indonesia, and competitive salary for undergraduate
cons: Small salary base for master degree, and less room to grow than the undergrad one

review_title: Good place if you enjoy challenges and research
pros:
-good network
-support pathway to get advanced degrees
cons:
-long work hours
-a lot of task & respondsibility

pros: Great access to development specialists and academicians.
cons: High dependence on stage of work and commitment from Principal Investigators
